name: Night shift (itch) (Insomne)
description:
A tiny "Papers, please" style game made with PICO-8

How to play :

  • Use the arrow keys to move
  • Stand by the window to see what's outside
  • Press Z to see the list of allowed employees, every time a new car arrives this list is refreshed, you have 20 seconds to check driver's ID and decide if it can pass or can not
  • Some instructions are displayed in the bottom part of the screen
  • To reduce your stress level read a book or watch TV

Remember you can download the cartridge (with tons of comments) right below!!!

If you enjoy my games please consider supporting me on Patreon
